Sasirangan Banjar is an initiative dedic: Sasirangan Banjar is an initiative dedicated to preserving and developing the traditional Sasirangan fabrics of South Kalimantan. We believe that the beauty and cultural value of each piece of Sasirangan cloth deserve to be passed down to future generations.
By infusing modern elements, we present: By infusing modern elements, we present Sasirangan in a variety of unique designs while upholding traditional values. Through innovative and sustainable fashion products, we strive to introduce Sasirangan to a wider audience, both domestically and internationally.
Fashion can be eco-friendly through our: Fashion can be eco-friendly through our dedicated sustainable practices.
All of us can join the workshop online o: Everyone is welcome to join our workshops, both online and offline, to learn the craft.
Partnerships between governments, privat: Partnerships between governments, private, and public bodies bring our goals closer.
We promote community and women’s empower: We promote community and women's empowerment through fair trade and an ethical approach.
We collaborate to increase our economic: We collaborate to increase our economic resilience and stability.
